page.title: 15Types of housing.
page.content:
A survey was done within each kilometre square of the block to illustrate the type and age of housing in the area.The factors chosen were:_
{A.}Pre 1939 private housing . {47% { B.}Post 1939 private housing . { 14% { C.}Pre 1939 Council/rented . { 4% { D.}Post 1939 private housing . {24% { E.}Flats{ 11%
Great differences were noted across the 12 kms surveyed eg.
{ 1 2 3 4 }Our numbering of the { 5 6 7 8 }kilometre blocks is as { 9 10 11 12 }follows.
{ A B C D E Square no.1 {3% 10% 0% 74% 13% Square no.12 {80% 10% 0% 5% 5%
